profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Operations Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Kubernetes**, and **CI/CD** methodologies to optimize infrastructure and enhance operational efficiency. My expertise in **GitLab**, **Helm**, **ArgoCD**, **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **CloudWatch** enables me to implement robust monitoring and incident response strategies that align with security best practices and cost optimization. I have a proven track record of building and managing scalable and resilient infrastructures in compliance with industry standards.
Additionally, I come from a strong background as a Full Stack Developer where I focused on crafting high-performance solutions across healthcare and financial sectors using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My experience with microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** further complements my ability to deliver secure applications and infrastructures.
